name: Crunches on Machine
how_to_perform:
1. Sit at the machine with your back supported and grab hold of the bar with both hands.

2. Position yourself so that your knees are bent and your feet are flat on the floor, or in some cases they may be placed on a footrest for stability.
3. Engage your core muscles to support your body as you lift your shoulders off the machine.

4. Slowly curl up towards your knees while keeping your lower back pressed against the pad of the machine.
5. Use your abdominal muscles to lift yourself, do not swing or jerk forward with momentum.
6. Hold at the top position for a brief moment before slowly lowering down to the starting position.
7. Repeat the movement for the desired number of repetitions.
short_summary: Crunches on Machine is an isolation exercise targeting the rectus abdominis, obliques and other stabilizer muscles, performed while seated at an incline bench or machine designed specifically for crunching exercises
